events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because the size I received does not fit me at all.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request regarding the purchased jacket's incorrect size.
A customer service agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to this case to provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket purchase. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the date you received the jacket to verify your purchase details?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I received the package on June 10th. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the information. We can proceed with your refund. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and assistance. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled smoothly, thank you very much for your help.
We are glad that your refund has been processed successfully. Closing the case now, and thank you for contacting our support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
